title: BJ's Wholesale to close for Thanksgiving for a 15th straight year

contentObject.content: BJ's Wholesale Club (BJ) said Tuesday it will once again remain closed on the Thanksgiving holiday, allowing its workers to spend the day with family and friends. The wholesaler said it's the 15th year it has opted to close for the holiday. Customers and members can still shop for Black Friday deals online at BJs.com on the day, however. The company will reopen for business on Friday, Nov. 26 at 7 a.m. Early Bird deals will be offered starting Nov. 4 and running through Nov. 29. Shares were not yet active premarket, but have gained 50% in the year to date, while the S&P 500  has gained 16%.
